message.name: PRESSUREWING_SYS
message.description: I2C sensor addresses for pressure wing.

message.name: PRESSUREWING_PASCAL
message.field: Left wing pressure converted to Pa
Right wing pressure converted to Pa

message.name: PRESSUREWING_LIFT
message.description: This messages contains the local lift, and whole wing lift estimates.
message.field: Local lifts from planar pressure approximation, left wing
Local lifts from planar pressure approximation, right wing
Estimated lift of entire Left wing, derived from local lifts
Estimated lift of entire Right wing, derived from local lifts

message.name: PRESSUREWING_WING_DATA
message.description: This messages contains all the pressure measurements and derived states of the wing.
message.field: Side of wing (0 for left, 1 for right)
Local lifts from planar pressure approximation
Estimated lift of entire wing, derived from local lifts
